GSD.description:
drm/radeon: fix a possible null pointer dereference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit b33f7d99c9226892c7794dc2500fae35966020c9. For more details please see the references link.
